paringKnife.name: Paring Knife
paringKnife.description: Just a lil knife. Increases click strength by 1

chefsKnife.name: Chef's Knife
chefsKnife.description: Now we're talking! Increase click strength by 5

knifeTraining.name: Train knife skills
knifeTraining.description: Chop faster! Increases click strength by 10

ambidextrous.name: Ambidexterity
ambidextrous.description: Work with both hands! Increases click strength by 25

armGlaives.name: Full Arm Glaives
armGlaives.description: Full arm knives like Batman, increases click strength by 100

headbutting.name: Headbutting
headbutting.description: You've figured out how to headbutt onions into a perfect dice! Increases click strength by 250

ninjaTraining.name: Ninja Training
ninjaTraining.description: Take a break to train with ninjas! Increases click strength by 500

oneWithTheOnion.name: One with the Onion
oneWithTheOnion.description: Become One with the onion, let the knowledge of its layers flow through you. Increases click strength by 1250

ogres.name: Ogres
ogres.description: Ogres are like onions. Increases click strength by 5000

busboy.name: Grab Busboy
busboy.description: Grab a busboy from the floor to help you chop. Not very fast, but they've got spirit. +1 chops per second

newCook.name: Hire another Cook
newCook.description: Hire another prep cook. +10 chops per second

autochopper.name: Automated Chopper
autochopper.description: Basic autochopper. Loud, but can chop 25 onions a second

angryMonkeys.name: Herd of angry monkeys with knives
angryMonkeys.description: Not necessarily up to food code, but they have the fervor. Can chop 100 onions per second

oldPrepCook.name: One (1) old prep cook
oldPrepCook.description: They've been doing this longer than you or your parents have been alive, just get out of the way. Can chop 750 onions per second.

deluxeChopper.name: The Deluxe Autochopping system
deluxeChopper.description: This top of the line system recently released by Onions Inc. can chop 2500 onions per second, but requires the purchase of an entire building to house it

busboyHype.name: Hype up your Busboys
busboyHype.description: Encourage the busboys to chop faster!! Increases busboy chop speed by 1 onion per second

cookBonus.name: Give Cook a Bonus
cookBonus.description: Give your cooks a bonus!! Increases cook chop speed by 3 onions per second

greaseChopper.name: Grease your Autochopper
greaseChopper.description: Maker sure the autochopper is running smoothly!! Increases chop speed by 5 onions per second

knifeSharpener.name: Knife Sharpener
knifeSharpener.description: Sharpen your knives regularly! Automatically purchases the Paring knife and Chef's Knife upgrades

FOHTrainer.name: Front of House Trainer
FOHTrainer.description: Trains Front of House to use knives! Automatically purchases the 'Grab Busboy' autoclicker

trainer.name: Knife Arts Trainer
trainer.description: Helps you hone your skills! Automatically purchases the Ambidexterity and Train Knife Skills upgrades

martialtrainer.name: Martial Arts Trainer
martialtrainer.description: Helps with your martial skills! Automatically purchases the Arm Glaives, Headbutting, and Ninja training upgrades

mechanic.name: Mechanic
mechanic.description: Helps you maintain your machines! Automatically purchases the Automated Chopper upgrade

monkeyWrangler.name: Monkey Wrangler
monkeyWrangler.description: helps wrangle your monkeys so they stop attacking passerby! Automatically purchases the Herd of Angry Monkeys with Knives autoclicker
